name: SBILife
0:
”Alexa open s. b. i. life”
”Alexa ask s. b. i. life what is term plan”
”Alexa ask s. b. i. life what is life insurance”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: s. b. i. life
des:
Welcome to SBI Life Insurance, a virtual assistant for all your insurance needs. 
We are one of the leading Life Insurance companies in India, We provide a range of life Insurance and pension products for customers With our assistant you can learn about Life Insurance and also understand about our various products and services.

This skill helps you get all the answers about Insurance and its benefits, Types of Plans and policies, and process related queries. Just enable the skill by saying, "Alexa, enable SBI life" and start asking all the question you have about SBI Life Insurance.

Following are some of the questions that you can ask : 
"What is vesting Age ?",
"What is Fund Value ?",
"What is Switching? ",
"What is Money back policy?"
etc.


Disclaimer: Trade logo displayed above belongs to State Bank of India and is used by SBI Life under license.

IRDAI Registration No. 111
